resources.string: You will need to follow some key steps in order for this update to install successfully, please read and take note of the following steps.
Press and hold both the “Volume Up” and the “Power” keys at the same time…
Keep pressing both keys for 3 seconds and then release only the “Volume Up” Key.
Once you see the menu options, release the “Power” key.
Use the “Volume Up/Down” key to highlight the “Apply update from SD card”, and press the “Power” key.
After the update is successful, at the bottom of the screen you will see “Install from SD card completed with status 0”.

Press the “Volume Up/Down” key to highlight “Reboot system now”. Once highlighted, briefly press the “Power” key (the device will now automatically reboot). Please note: The device may take several minutes to restart.

string.name: prompt_text8
string.Data: After your phone has restarted, if you wish, you can check the Software version from Settings > About Phone > Build number. A successful update will show as “"00WW_3_15K"”.

resources.string:
This software update is only for users of Nokia 3.1 Plus with software builds: 

 00WW_3_15H 
 00WW_3_15H_SP01 

 To check device build, go to “Settings“ > “About Phone“
I have read and understood the instructions and am ready to receive Nokia 3.1 Plus Android 10 Software update.
Let’s do final checks to ensure your device is ready…
At least 600MB free space on the SD card.

string.name: import_desc_update
string.Data:
Once you start the update, these steps
will not be shown on your device.

We recommend you either:

Open this link(www.nokia.com/phones/en_int/nokia-3-plus-OTA-support) on your computer or secondary device (if you have one) and either print off/copy down the instructions.

Your user data will not be lost after the software update, however as precaution, we recommended users perform a back up of user data before installing the update.

Once OK to continue, press Update

string.name: import_desc_next
string.Data:
Once you start the update, these steps will not be shown on your device.

We recommend you either:

Open this link(www.nokia.com/phones/en_int/nokia-3-plus-OTA-support) on your computer or secondary device (if you have one) and either print off/copy down the instructions.

Your user data will not be lost after the software update, however as precaution, we recommended users perform a back up of user data before installing the update.

Once OK to continue, press Next

resources.string: Use “Volume Down” or “Volume Up” key to switch options, select “Update.zip”, and press the “Power” key.
